job_description: Full-Stack Developer : Orbit Traders Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Orbit Traders Full-Stack Developer Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Tk. 200000 - 300000 (Monthly) Published: 31 Jan 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Experience Additional Requirements Only candidates with proven experience in TypeScript, React/Next.js, and active use of Cursor and/or Claude are eligible. Please do not apply if you do not meet these requirements. Expert-level English communication is mandatory. You will write documentation, communicate daily in Slack, and collaborate directly with US stakeholders. If writing in English isn’t second nature to you, this role is not a fit. Required Qualifications Expert-level English fluency (written and verbal)—non-negotiable 3+ years full-stack development experience Strong TypeScript and React/Next.js skills Active experience using Cursor and/or Claude for development Understanding of LLMs and experience with prompt engineering or AI integrations Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a remote setup Preferred Qualifications Experience building chat interfaces or conversational UIs Familiarity with multi-tenant SaaS architecture Experience with webhook implementations and third-party API integrations Backend experience with Node.js, PostgreSQL, and REST APIs Experience with AWS deployments Familiarity with Vercel AI SDK Previous experience working with US-based or international teams Responsibilities & Context We are a Seattle, Washington–based B2B SaaS company looking for a highly skilled Full-Stack Developer based in Bangladesh. You’ll work directly with our US-based engineering team building production AI chat systems and embeddable widgets for software companies. ** Active, hands-on experience using Cursor and/or Claude for development is required; applicants without substantial experience are strongly discouraged from applying. Working Hours Overlap with Seattle (PST) time zone is required. You must be available to work during US business hours. Responsibilities Build and maintain multi-tenant SaaS applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript Develop backend services including webhook integrations, authentication flows, and API endpoints Work on AI agent logic—prompt engineering, conversation flows, and LLM integrations Leverage Cursor, Claude Code, and AI coding tools to improve development efficiency Collaborate remotely with Seattle-based engineering team via Slack, Linear, and GitHub Participate in code reviews and architectural discussions Skills & Expertise Spoken and written fluency in English Suggested by Full Stack Development Next.js PostgreSQL react.js Compe

To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 35 years Basic to advanced knowledge of accounting principles Experience with Excel / Google Sheets (mandatory) Ability to analyze numbers and prepare reports accurately Good organizational and record-keeping skills Honest, responsible, and detail-oriented Responsibilities & Context Shanghai Food & Beverage Company Ltd. is looking for a dedicated and detail-oriented Accountant to manage and analyze the financial performance of different sections of the company. The selected candidate will be responsible for all expenses, calculating profits and losses, and preparing organized financial reports to support business decisions. Key Responsibilities: Record and calculate daily, weekly, and monthly expenses of each section of the Company. Maintain accurate financial records of purchases, sales, and operational costs. Prepare final summarized spreadsheets containing all financial data. Analyze financial performance and highlight areas of profit or loss. Ensure accuracy and transparency in all calculations. Assist management with financial insights and reports when required. National Sales Manager : SHANGHAI FOOD & BEVERAGE CO. LTD. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List SHANGHAI FOOD & BEVERAGE CO. LTD. National Sales Manager Application Deadline : 25 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 30 to 40 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 26 Jan 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 30 to 40 years Responsibilities & Context We are a manufacturing (Food & Beverage) company looking for proactive National Sales & Marketing Manager to meet job objectives without compromising company policies. Prepare an annual sales plan & implement strategies to make sales & achieve the sales target. Prepare and present regular sales reports, forecasts, and analyses to senior management. Build-on and develop relationships with new customers or clients. Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements. Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve revenue and growth targets within the division. Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of Regional Sales Managers and Territory Sales Managers to achieve individual and collective sales goals. Monitor and analyze sales performance metrics, market trends, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth. Manage key customer accounts and maintain strong relationships to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty. Coordinate with divisional sales management and others department to align divisional sales strategies with overall business objectives. Provide training, coaching, and professional development opportunities for sales team members. Collaborate with HR on recruitment, selection, and on boarding of sales team members. Foster a positive and productive work environment that promotes teamwork and high performance. Ensuring distribution of primary and secondary sales that is assigned by the company. Ensure market return reduction and proper monitoring of damaged products and maintain them. Follow competitive activities and ensure regular feedback to management regularly. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Sales & Marketing Strategic Planning Target Oriented Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Mobile bill,Performance bonus Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. job_title: Flyer Designer/ AI Videos/ Canva/ Photoshop Designer
job_description: Flyer Designer/ AI Videos/ Canva/ Photoshop Designer : Rigglo Technologies Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Rigglo Technologies Flyer Designer/ AI Videos/ Canva/ Photoshop Designer Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 18 to 40 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Tk. 12000 - 15000 (Monthly) Published: 16 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Additional Requirements Age 18 to 40 years Responsibilities & Context Graphic Design & Content Creation Design engaging and on-brand digital assets, including social media banners, flyers, ads, and infographics for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and TikTok . Edit and repurpose existing images and videos to create fresh content for various campaign needs . Translate complex ideas or data into clear, visually appealing infographics and illustrations that enhance audience understanding . Ensure all designs are optimized for specific platform requirements (dimensions, file size, mobile viewing) and maintain brand consistency . AI Video Generation & Multimedia Production Utilize generative AI video platforms (RunwayML, Pika Labs, CapCut AI, Veo) to create short-form video content for social media, such as Reels, Shorts, and promotional ads . Integrate AI-generated footage into traditional video editing workflows using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects for final polish, compositing, and motion graphics . Enhance audio quality and synchronize voiceovers using AI audio tools (e.g., Adobe Podcast AI) . Capture and edit video content from various sources, including mobile devices, to support quick-turnaround social media stories and campaigns . Skills & Expertise Adobe Photoshop Content Creation Content Marketing Content writing Photo and video editing software Photo Editing Photo Retouching Video content creating Video Editing Compensation & Other Benefits Performance bonus Salary Review: Yearly Monday to Friday (2PM to 7PM) Workplace Work from home,Work at office Employment Status Part Time Job Location Dhaka Company Information Rigglo Technologies Follow Address: Lion Shopping Complex, Monipuri Para, Report this Job / Company (রিপোর্ট) রিপোর্ট এই চাকরির জন্য বিজ্ঞাপনদাতা ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠান আপনার কাছ থেকে কোন অর্থ চাইলে কিংবা নিয়োগ প্রক্রিয়া চলাকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানিমূলক (শারীরিক/মানসিক) আচরণ করলে অতিসত্ত্বর আমাদেরকে জানান অথবা জবটি রিপোর্ট করুন। চাকরি পাওয়ার জন্য কোন ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠানকে অর্থ প্রদান করবেন না। চাকরিকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানির (শারীরিক/মানসিক) সম্ভাবনা থাকলে সেখানে জয়েন করবেন না। কোন প্রকার অর্থ লেনদেন বা নিয়োগদাতা কর্তৃক হয়রানির দায়িত্ব বিডিজবস বহন করবে না। 09638666444 , 01897627858 complain@bdjobs.com ⏸ Internal auditor certificate course on ISO 14001:2015 Enviro... 3000 BDT Joyshree Das Register Now Internal Auditor cer

সেলসম্যান : TALERB ENTERPRISE Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List TALERB ENTERPRISE সেলসম্যান Application Deadline : 21 Mar 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 02 Age: At least 20 years Location: Kurigram (Rajarhat) Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At least 20 years সততা ও কঠোর পরিশ্রম করার মানসিকতা থাকতে হবে।​ ব্যবহার মার্জিত ও সুশৃঙ্খল হতে হবে।​ অভিজ্ঞ প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার দেওয়া হবে (তবে নতুনরাও আবেদন করতে পারবেন)। ​নিজস্ব বাইসাইকেল বা মোটরসাইকেল থাকলে সুবিধা হবে। Responsibilities & Context কুড়িগ্রাম জেলার রাজারহাট বাজারের স্বনামধন্য ব্যবসা প্রতিষ্ঠান তালেব এন্টারপ্রাইজ -এ মাঠ পর্যায়ে কাজ করার জন্য ২ জন কর্মঠ ও চটপটে সেলসম্যান নিয়োগ দেওয়া হবে। ​ কাজের বিবরণ: ​ কাজের ধরণ: সরাসরি মাঠ পর্যায়ে (দোকানে দোকানে) বিভিন্ন মুদি সামগ্রী বিক্রয় ও অর্ডার সংগ্রহ করা। ​ কর্ম এলাকা: রাজারহাট ও এর আশেপাশের ইউনিয়নসমূহ। Skills & Expertise Sales Representative Salesman Compensation & Other Benefits মাসিক বেতন (আলোচনা সাপেক্ষে)। ​বিক্রয়ের ওপর আকর্ষণীয় কমিশন বা বোনাস (আলোচনা সাপেক্ষে)। Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Job Location Kurigram (Rajarhat) Read Before Apply আগ্রহী প্রার্থীদের কে মোবাইল নাম্বার উল্লেখপূর্বক জীবন বৃত্তান্ত(CV), ছবি, শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতাও অভিজ্ঞতার সনদ এবং NID কার্ডের কপি সহ ইমেইল এর মাধ্যমে আবেদন করার জন্য আহবান করা যাচ্ছে। ইমেইল : talebenterprise345@gmail.com Apply Procedure Email Your CV Send your CV to the given email talebenterprise345@gmail.com or Email your CV from My Bdjobs account Company Information TALERB ENTERPRISE Follow Address: Rajarhat Bazar, Rajarhat, Kurigram Report this Job / Company (রিপোর্ট) রিপোর্ট এই চাকরির জন্য বিজ্ঞাপনদাতা ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠান আপনার কাছ থেকে কোন অর্থ চাইলে কিংবা নিয়োগ প্রক্রিয়া চলাকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানিমূলক (শারীরিক/মানসিক) আচরণ করলে অতিসত্ত্বর আমাদেরকে জানান অথবা জবটি রিপোর্ট করুন। চাকরি পাওয়ার জন্য কোন ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠানকে অর্থ প্রদান করবেন না। চাকরিকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানির (শারীরিক/মানসিক) সম্ভাবনা থাকলে সেখানে জয়েন করবেন না। কোন প্রকার অর্থ লেনদেন বা নিয়োগদাতা কর্তৃক হয়রানির দায়িত্ব বিডিজবস বহন করবে না। 09638666444 , 01897627858 complain@bdjobs.com ⏸ Internal auditor certificate course on ISO 14001:2015 Enviro... 3000 BDT Joyshree Das Register Now Internal Auditor certificate course on ISO 9001:2015 4000 BDT Joyshree Das Register Now Project Cycle Management (PCM) for the NGO Professionals 4500 BDT Tareq Ahmed Register Now Lean Six Sigma-Yellow Belt 3500 BDT Engr. Sr Manager / General Manager (Compliance,HR,Admin) : Patriot Group Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Patriot Group Sr Manager / General Manager (Compliance,HR,Admin) Application Deadline : 19 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 40 to 55 years Location: Gazipur (Tongi) Salary: Negotiable Experience: 10 to 20 years Published: 20 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Master of Business Administration (MBA) in HRM Master's PGD in Compliance Experience 10 to 20 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Buying House, Garments, Textile Additional Requirements Age 40 to 55 years Responsibilities & Context Ensure compliance with local labor laws, international standards, and buyer codes of conduct. • Lead and manage audits including SEDEX (4 Pillar), NIRAPON, HIGG FEM & FSLM, ISO 14001, GRS, GOTS, and Buyer CoC. • Maintain updated documentation and ensure readiness for external audits covering labor, safety, environmental, and ethical standards. • Oversee renewal and maintenance of legal permits (Trade, Fire, Factory, Environmental, Generator, Explosive licenses). • Conduct job safety analyses, risk assessments, and deliver compliance and safety training programs. • Supervise ZDHC and environmental compliance testing (water, wastewater, emissions, noise, lighting). • Manage chemical inventories and MSDS updates, ensuring strict chemical safety measures. • Lead sustainability initiatives related to energy, water, and waste management. • Coordinate compliance reporting through customer and government web portals. • Act as liaison with Fire & Civil Defense, Labor Office, Factory Inspectorate, and Environmental authorities. Skills & Expertise Skills & Expertise Compliance Management HR and Administration Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill Festival Bonus : 2 Competitive salary and benefits.
